articles.description: 'Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein' featuring R Madhavan, Dia Mirza and Saif Ali Khan was released in 2001. In a recent interview, the actress revealed that she felt discomfort with Madhavan's character stalking her in the movie.

articles.title: Indian TV Actor Recounts Israel Horror After Family Shot Dead By Hamas - NDTV
articles.description: Actor Madhura Naik has lost her cousin sister and brother-in-law in the brutal Hamas attack in Israel on Saturday. The two were driving back to their father's home when they were caught by the Hamas operatives and shot dead.
